dogecoin.text:
@absaulete @sonofmigaloo @_SuperNovah @Mikurr1 @CryptoKaleo What about GameStop or safemoon?  I just want to understand the rules.  

Can I not question the growth potential of anything, or is it only Dogecoin specifically that is off-limits for those kinds of comments?

@LicenZe2KillU @RobertVogan9 @JustinScerini If you NEED Dogecoin to be worth 130 times Bitcoin’s total value to feel like you made a good choice then I hope the laws of the universe and mathematics somehow disintegrate so that can happen for you.

@Doge2TheMoon_21 @elonmusk Before SNL:  Elon is going to send Dogecoin TO THE MOOOOOON!

After SNL: What, did you think a TV show would matter?

@Duckyyy2theMoon @dogecoin_empire A medium of exchange would obviously not be a pyramid.  Doge is very limited in that aspect currently, but to the extent it is adopted it would move away from pyramid status.

It is not there right now.

@Lyricaltastebu1 @Hitherrmann @MuroCrypto Is Dogecoin profit based on more coins being bought after you bought yours than were bought beforehand, without any service or good being provided?  End of argument.

@Duckyyy2theMoon @dogecoin_empire Obviously a diversified portfolio can’t be annihilated by one asset going down.  

If you think a 1000%+ rise in a pyramid scheme has been driven by portfolio diversification I don’t know what to tell you.

@zone8Heather @TheHazardMonkey @MrJackson716 @Rossmcnally4 @dogecoin_empire You can absolutely profit on hype.  Pyramid schemes really do generate profit for the right people as defined by their entry point.

Know what you’re into though.
@TheHazardMonkey @MrJackson716 @Rossmcnally4 @dogecoin_empire It is.
@MrJackson716 @TheHazardMonkey @Rossmcnally4 @dogecoin_empire For a person who got in in January?  Nothing much.  For someone who got in on Wednesday? 40%.

@RjKiVani @elonmusk Doge Army before SNL: Dogecoin will achieve a $50 Trillion market cap!

Doge Army after SNL: buy the dips!
@TheHazardMonkey @MrJackson716 @Rossmcnally4 @dogecoin_empire Facts?  The fact is that Doge has lost almost 40% of its value because the Dogefather called it a scam on TV.
@MrJackson716 @Rossmcnally4 @dogecoin_empire No, but I can show you lots of charts that don’t fluctuate wildly based on the jokes on SNL.
@VincentVanDoge1 @dogecoin_empire Yeah, the Doge community would never rub their gains in everyone’s faces.  Nope, not at all (and I made a mint on Doge).
@gamble_ric @dogecoin_empire Well, this is not correct at all.
@Rossmcnally4 @dogecoin_empire Yeah, and them losing it because people like you relentlessly proclaim “Doge to the moon” isn’t part of that.  Nope, not at all.
@dogecoin_empire Is it ok to hate that people are getting financially annihilated and that this is likely to continue?

@SeanWhiting14 @C_Barraud You are insane and your perspective is going to get everyone who believes it destroyed.  A $25 Dogecoin is a $3 trillion+ market cap.

Take profit or get rekt.
@SturdyBusiness I don’t even own Bitcoin, but if he crashes it everything else will fall too. Including Dogecoin.

@Mrbankstips @elonmusk @ChainLinkGod @PeterMcCormack Do you think it’s good for one guy’s Twitter to be able to subtract hundreds of billions from an entire marketplace?  

I know you’re happy he is propping up Dogecoin, but the whole market’s health seems immensely dependent on his fickle personal approval and that isn’t good.
@JohnKra72072718 @elonmusk Absolutely.  The problem was (and is) that lots of these people believed that the moon is a $1000 Dogecoin.
@JKamler @og_dogecoin The move is to wait for the next Elon tweet and then bail three hours after he sends it.
@CryptoA40672341 Is there any evidence anywhere that he owns or ever owned Dogecoin, or only speculation?

@iamjax777 @dogecoin_rise @elonmusk Guys, Doge WENT to the moon.  It increased thousands of percent in almost no time.  It isn’t doing that again.  The claim is played out.  

You might get a 2-3X over five years, but tweeting about Dogecoin running the Martian economy every day isn’t going to do anything.
@foodie_egg @ETHDougBlrdd @sammy_camp1 @realklutchmamba @Cizma8 @MattWallace888 Pretty sure Matt and most Dogecoin people were enthusiastically recommending people to buy the top.
